title: Melania Trump visits children at holiday charity drive on Marine base
shortDescription: Melania Trump visits a Toys for Tots charity drive with children of service members at Marine Corps Base Quantico on Dec. 8, 2025.

title: Report says Trump did same 'mortgage fraud' he accuses his targets of
shortDescription: President Donald Trump engaged in a similar arrangement to what he has called potentially criminal "mortgage fraud," according to a ProPublica report.

title: Supreme Court seems likely to give Trump more power over agencies
shortDescription: President Trump wants the Supreme Court to overturn a 90-year-old precedent limiting his ability to remove leaders of independent agencies.

title: The SCOTUS case that will decide Trump's power
shortDescription: The Supreme Court hears a case that will decide President Donald Trump's power over federal agencies.

title: What Marjorie Taylor Greene said about Trump in '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: The controversial Georgia representative who severed ties with Donald Trump defended her move to leave office in a '60 Minutes' interview.

title: Donald Trump slams CBS over Marjorie 'Traitor' Greene interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump slammed "60 Minutes" and Lesley Stahl for an interview featuring Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, who he calls a "traitor."

title: Trump is signing an order on federal AI rules. Here's why.
shortDescription: All 50 states and DC have introduced AI legislation this year, with 38 states adopting around 100 measures in 2025.

title: Trump in 'Home Alone 2' was one of many cameos before his political rise
shortDescription: President Donald Trump made a number of TV and movie appearances before getting involved in politics. See his role in "Home Alone 2: Lost in New York"

title: MTG talks MAGA fallout, Trump at Kennedy Honors
shortDescription: Marjorie Taylor Greene talks fallout with Trump and MAGA. Also, the president takes center stage at the Kennedy Center.

title: Gov. Tim Walz daughter fires back at Trump over 'R' slur in TikTok post
shortDescription: "Calling my dad what he did has unleashed a (multi-expletive) storm," Hope Walz said. "I have people DMing me saying absolutely horrendous things."

title: Trump comments on Netflix, Warner Bros. deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he will review the proposed $72B Netflix-Warner Bros. Discovery deal amid antitrust concerns.

title: Trump expected to announce $12 billion package of farm aid
shortDescription: Trump is expected to announce a $12 billion package to help farmers hurt by low crop prices and tariff policies.

title: Trump leads Kennedy Center Honors celebration
shortDescription: President Donald Trump emcee'd the Kennedy Center Honors, recognizing Sylvester Stallone, Gloria Gaynor, George Strait, Michael Crawford and KISS.

title: Trump says Netflix-Warner Bros. deal 'could be a problem'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump weighed in on Netflix's deal to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, saying he would be involved in the review.

title: Trump pardons Democratic Texas Congressman Cuellar
shortDescription: President Trump said he was granting a "full and unconditional pardon" to Democratic House Representative Henry Cuellar of Texas, and his wife Imelda, who were charged with bribery.

title: Trump accuses pardoned lawmaker of â€˜lack of loyalty'
shortDescription: The Democrat is running for reelection after the president pardoned him on bribery charges. Trump called the move a "lack of loyalty."

title: Trump hosts Kennedy Center Honors. What to know, how to watch
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has made several changes to the venerated awards since taking office. Here's how the 2025 event will be different.

title: 'Vile': Walz hits back after Trump targets Somali immigrants
shortDescription: The Democratic governor of Minnesota once again knocked the president over his comments on Somali immigrants, calling the insults 'vile' and 'racist lies.'

title: Cancelled White House picnic on 9/11, movie nights: Usher remembers
shortDescription: Gary Walters, 79, is sharing behind-the-scenes looks at his time serving presidents including Jimmy Carter, Ronald Reagan and Bill Clinton.
